mapper.select: SELECT b.item_idx , b.Title , b.uidx , b.Contents , b.wdate , u.nickName , b.Price , b.image1 FROM Board_Items b, AnnaUser u WHERE b.uidx = u.uidx and b.uidx = #{uidx} and b.item_idx not like #{item_idx} order by item_idx limit 1,6

SELECT b.item_idx , b.Title , b.uidx , b.Contents , b.wdate , b.cate_idx , b.image1 , b.image2 , b.image3 , b.image4 , b.image5 , b.image6 , b.image7 , b.image8 , b.image9 , b.image10 , u.nickname , b.Keyword , b.Price , b.offer , b.state
FROM Board_Items b , AnnaUser u WHERE b.uidx = u.uidx AND b.item_idx = #{item_idx}

select min(Price) , b.item_idx , b.Title , b.uidx , b.Contents , b.wdate , b.cate_idx , image1 , u.nickname , b.Keyword , b.Price , b.offer , b.state from Board_Items b inner join AnnaUser u on b.uidx = u.uidx where b.isDel = 'N'
AND b.title like concat ('%',#{searchVal},'%')
order by b.wdate desc limit 0,1
select neighbor_idx from Neighbor where uidx = #{uidx}
select neighbor_idx from Neighbor where uidx = #{uidx}
select contents,date_format(now(),'%y-%m-%d-%h:%i') from chat where chat_host = #{chat_host} and invited = #{invited} and item_idx = #{item_idx} order by cidx
